strapiPost.title: Rezoning In Fayetteville Resulting In Plans For Hotel, Apartments, Retail, Offices
strapiPost.content:
Redevelopment of the Lewis Ford site on North College in Fayetteville is coming together slowly. 

  • Zones: The City Council voted last week to rezone seven acres of the Lewis Ford dealership property, located across from Village Inn on College. The rezone now allows for both commercial and residential uses. Almost six acres west of the dealership is still up for the councilâ€™s zoning consideration during its meeting on April 5.
  • Concepts: Ideas for the rezoned areas include walking trails around the property, an apartment complex with a swimming pool and dog park, office space, retail space, an event space, and a restaurant/bar with patio.

Read the Fayetteville Flyer story HERE.
